description: The new Chaos Space Marines codex is here, sporting the largest selection of detachments yet and a whole host of changes to Datasheets. As always, I (Wings) have assimilated all of this information directly into my brain, but we have so many devoted Chaos Lords on staff that there’s no need for me to deploy […]
title: Know Thy Enemy: An Opponent’s Guide to the Chaos Space Marine Codex

description: Are you ready for the summer of Chaos 2024? We’re two weeks away from the release of the 10th edition version of Codex: Chaos Space Marines and with it, some fire rules that add a ton of depth and nuance to the faction. We’re excited to talk about this one, so get comfortable and dig […]
title: Codex: Chaos Space Marines 10th Edition – The Goonhammer Review

description: We take a deep look at the Renegade Raiders Detachment from Codex: Chaos Space Marines, and look at what may be the strongest Detachment in the game.
title: Detachment Focus: Renegade Raiders

description: We take a deep dive into the Pactbound Zealots Detachment, talk about how it changed from the Slaves to Darkness, and how to play with it.
title: Detachment Focus: Pactbound Zealots

description: We take a deep look at the Dread Talons Detachment - the rules behind it, and how to make it work in games.
title: Detachment Focus: Dread Talons

description: We take a deep dive into the Fellhammer Siege-Host Detachment from Codex: Chaos Space Marines and look at how to play it on the tabletop.
title: Detachment Focus: Fellhammer Siege-Host

description: We take a deep dive into the Chaos Cults Detachment from the 10th Edition release of Codex: Chaos Space Marines and talk about how we might make it work (for a price).
title: Detachment Focus: Chaos Cult

description: We take a deep dive into the new Veterans of the Long War Detachment in Codex: Chaos Space Marines and talk about how to play it on the table.
title: Detachment Focus: Veterans of the Long War

description: We take a deep dive into the Soulforged Warpack Detachment, talk about its rules, and what makes it so powerful.

description: We take a deep look at the Deceptors Detachment from Codex: Chaos Space Marines, looking at its rules and how it works.
title: Detachment Focus: Deceptors
